DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether exposure to Al, Ga, In, As, and Sb induces lipid peroxidation in humans. Whole blood and urine levels of 170 workers were analysed by use of ICP-MS. MDA, the product of lipid peroxidation was determined by HPLC
DOC.brief_title: Lipid Peroxidation in Workers Exposed to Al,Ga,In,As,and Sb in Optoelectronic Industry
DOC.detailed_description: If MDA as an index of lipid peroxidation can be induced by these metals. We will suggest reducing exposure to these metals
